page.title: 17LEISURE
page.content: In this area there are quite a few { leisure}activities. .Some of the activities are, Bingo, Women's Institute and Mothers and Toddlers.A lot of people go to the {clubs}for company. There is not a lot for{teenagers}to do.There is a pub dinner dance or disco once a month. There is also a keep fit class,because people nowadays are very keen on keeping trim.The people who live in the villages find that there are{leisure}activities,but the people who live outside the villages don't.Other{clubs}are,{sports ,gardening ,friendship and photographic{clubs}.Other things that people do in their spare time are, fishing, riding and cricket.
